name: places/ChIJN6NI8Cz3wokRYZ6KChzQgGk
adrFormatAddress: 2702 Broadway, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: I saw Dr. Lee for the 1st time today.  After years of being treated by several specialists at CPMC, I've found my PCP.  She is patient, communicates well, and was familiar with my extensive medical history when we met.

text.text: I saw Dr. Lee for the 1st time today.  After years of being treated by several specialists at CPMC, I've found my PCP.  She is patient, communicates well, and was familiar with my extensive medical history when we met.

originalText.text: Not a great bed side manners. She was not great communicater, and sat me down for the frist 15 minutes to tell me that my annual check up does not include the blood work, and some insurance might not cover it. I have get my annual check up every year from Columbia and Weill Cornell and never heard a such a thing. She didnt want to do the blood work..Not going back to her. Such a shamed becuase I really like to front desk and the nurse. Theyw ere great.

originalText.text: Excellent bedside manner. Reassuring and knowledgeable. Linked to a large network of specialists through Columbia if you need a specialist such as a gastroenterologist etc. Lovely office as well!

text.text: Excellent bedside manner. Reassuring and knowledgeable. Linked to a large network of specialists through Columbia if you need a specialist such as a gastroenterologist etc. Lovely office as well!

originalText.text: Extremely caring, knowledgeable and has empathy. You can talk to her, get good information and she treats you like you are important.

text.text: Extremely caring, knowledgeable and has empathy. You can talk to her, get good information and she treats you like you are important.

originalText.text: Loved my visit today. Ms. Young made my visit comforting and good. Dr.Lee was great as well.
